tip.tipsmod.animal_growing.text: Feeding baby animals will make them grow up faster.
tip.tipsmod.arthropods.text: The bane of arthropods enchantment also increases damage against silverfish, endermites, and bees.
tip.tipsmod.axolotl_food.text: Axolotls like to eat tropical fish.
tip.tipsmod.azalea_caves.text: Azalea trees grow above the lush cave biomes.
tip.tipsmod.baby_panda_slimeball.text: Baby Pandas have a very rare chance to drop a slimeball after they sneeze.
tip.tipsmod.barrel.text: Barrels are a convenient alternative to chests.
tip.tipsmod.bed_explode.text: Trying to sleep in other dimensions will end poorly.
tip.tipsmod.bed_respawn.text: Sleeping in a bed will set your spawn point.
tip.tipsmod.biome_bonemeal.text: Using bone meal on grass blocks can give different types of flowers.
tip.tipsmod.biome_fishing.text: Fishing in a Jungle can give you different items compared to fishing in other biomes.
tip.tipsmod.blaze_fuel.text: Blaze rods are good fuel for furnaces.
tip.tipsmod.blaze_snowball.text: Blazes take damage when hit by snowballs.
tip.tipsmod.bucket_friends.text: Fish and axolotls can be safely picked up using buckets.
tip.tipsmod.bucket_rename.text: Renaming a bucket with a mob inside will rename that mob as well.
tip.tipsmod.coarse_to_dirt.text: Coarse dirt can be converted into normal dirt using a hoe.
tip.tipsmod.compass_spawn.text: Compasses point to the spawn point of your world.
tip.tipsmod.cooked_drops.text: Animals killed by fire damage usually drop cooked food.
tip.tipsmod.creeper_cat.text: Creepers are afraid of cats and will run away from them.
tip.tipsmod.creeper_drops_disc.text: Creepers will drop a music disc when killed by a skeletons arrow.
tip.tipsmod.crouch_blocks.text: Crouching will prevent you from falling off the side of blocks.
tip.tipsmod.deflect_ghast_fireballs.text: You can deflect ghast fireballs by attacking them.
tip.tipsmod.dog_health.text: The lower a dog's tail, the less health they have left.
tip.tipsmod.dog_rotten_flesh.text: You can heal wolves by feeding them rotten flesh.
tip.tipsmod.dripstone_lava.text: Pointed dripstone below lava will slowly drip lava particles. This can be used to fill a cauldron.
tip.tipsmod.elytra_boost.text: Using fireworks while flying with an elytra can boost your speed!
tip.tipsmod.end_dimension.text: You cannot leave the end dimension without defeating the ender dragon.. or dying.
tip.tipsmod.enderman_blocks.text: Enderman can move blocks like dirt, sand, and TNT!
tip.tipsmod.enderman_projectiles.text: Endermen can not be hit by projectiles.
tip.tipsmod.enderman_pumpkin.text: Wearing a carved pumpkin lowers the risk of enderman noticing you.
tip.tipsmod.enderman_stare.text: Enderman become hostile if you stare them in the eyes.
tip.tipsmod.endermites.text: Endermites may spawn when an enderman teleports or an enderpearl is used.
tip.tipsmod.fall_damage_blocks.text: Some blocks like water and hay can reduce fall damage.
tip.tipsmod.fortress_triangulation.text: You can triangulate stronghold locations by summoning eyes of ender from two different locations and tracking where their paths intersect.
tip.tipsmod.fossils.text: Large fossils can be found under swamps and deserts.
tip.tipsmod.four_eggs.text: Hatching chicken eggs may spawn four chickens on very rare occasions.
tip.tipsmod.freezing_leather.text: Leather armor can protect against freezing damage.
tip.tipsmod.goat_milk.text: Goats can be milked using a bucket.
tip.tipsmod.gravity_torch.text: Falling blocks like sand and gravel instantly break when falling onto a torch.
tip.tipsmod.iron_golem_heal.text: Iron golems can be healed by giving them iron ingots.
tip.tipsmod.job_site_dimension.text: Villagers lose their job site when changing dimensions.
tip.tipsmod.lava_fuel.text: Lava buckets can be used as fuel in the furnace.
tip.tipsmod.locked_repeaters.text: Repeaters can be locked and kept in its state by powering the sides of it with another repeater.
tip.tipsmod.lure_animals.text: Animals may follow you if you hold a food they like.
tip.tipsmod.mean_goats.text: Be careful around goats. They like to push players and other animals off cliffs.
tip.tipsmod.mooshroom_lightning.text: Red mooshrooms become brown, and brown mooshrooms become red, when struck by lightning.
tip.tipsmod.mushroom_biome_spawns.text: Hostile mobs do not spawn on mushroom islands.
tip.tipsmod.mushroom_placement.text: Mushrooms can not grow in direct sunlight.
tip.tipsmod.nether_lava.text: Lava spreads out faster in the nether.
tip.tipsmod.nether_sponge.text: Wet sponges will immediately dry when placed in the nether.
tip.tipsmod.nether_travel.text: Traveling one block in the nether is equivalent to traveling eight blocks in the overworld.
tip.tipsmod.note_block_instrument.text: The sound a note block makes will change based on the block beneath it.
tip.tipsmod.obsidian_formation.text: Obsidian is formed when water hits a lava source block.
tip.tipsmod.ore_tiers.text: Some ores have a minimum required pickaxe tier to mine them.
tip.tipsmod.peaceful_tnt.text: TNT cannot damage players in peaceful mode.
tip.tipsmod.piglin_repellent.text: Piglins are scared of soul fire blocks including the soul torch and soul lantern.
tip.tipsmod.poison_immune.text: Zombies, skeletons, and spiders are all immune to poison damage.
tip.tipsmod.portal_trick.text: By using water and lava buckets you can make an easy nether portal.
tip.tipsmod.scrap_nuggets.text: Old gold and iron equipment can be smelted into nuggets.
tip.tipsmod.shear_mooshroom.text: You can shear a mooshroom to turn it into a normal cow.
tip.tipsmod.sheared_cave_vines.text: You can shear the ends of cave vines to stop them from growing.
tip.tipsmod.shears_dispenser.text: You can put shears in a dispenser to shear sheep.
tip.tipsmod.shulker_armor.text: Shulkers take significantly less damage when their shells are closed.
tip.tipsmod.smoke_bees.text: Bees can be pacified by placing a campfire beneath their hive.
tip.tipsmod.snow_golem_trail.text: You can harvest infinite snowballs from a snow golems trail.
tip.tipsmod.spider_jockey.text: On rare occasions skeletons may ride spiders into combat!
tip.tipsmod.sponge_bucket.text: Wet sponge can be dried in a furnace by cooking it. If there is an empty bucket in the fuel slot the bucket will catch the water!
tip.tipsmod.string_wool.text: String can be crafted into wool.
tip.tipsmod.swamp_slime.text: Slimes can spawn in swamps during a full moon.
tip.tipsmod.turtle_shell.text: Turtles only drop scutes when a baby grows into an adult.
tip.tipsmod.undead_damage.text: Undead mobs are damaged by health potions and healed by damage potions.
tip.tipsmod.undead_helmet.text: Undead mobs will not burn in daylight if they are wearing a helmet.
tip.tipsmod.wandering_invis.text: Wandering traders drink invisibility potions at night.
tip.tipsmod.water_grass.text: Water can quickly break grass patches and get seeds.
tip.tipsmod.wax_copper.text: Honeycombs can be used to wax copper blocks. This prevents them from oxidizing.
tip.tipsmod.weather_sleep.text: Sleeping will clear up the sky and stop storm or rain.
tip.tipsmod.west.text: The Sun, moon, and stars all move towards the west.
tip.tipsmod.witch_conversion.text: Villagers transform into witches when struck by lightning.
tip.tipsmod.wooden_tool_fuel.text: Old wooden tools can be used as fuel in the furnace.
tip.tipsmod.zombie_armor.text: Zombies take slightly less damage than most mobs.
